data.text: Yalingupala ga heye hela kangibagulaga na wayage,
Mpoka hambe yanojezwe na luhala,
Vyoukuya wihe, kwanguyaga na kubeza kahi,
Ulonzi wa munhu ndo mazi menji,
Haiwele goya kumganilila mwihe,
Ulonzi wa mpoka wangigalaga kilewa,
Mlomo wa mpoka wangumdumyaga heye yuye,
Ulonzi wa munhu yalinguheha ndo kota chilyo chinojile,
Munhu mgata kuli mijito ja heye,
Mkulu Nguluwi ndo ngome iwele nzinzili,
Lufufu lwa yawele na lufufu ndo ngome ya heye,
Kidaya kwa mnhumbula kwangigalaga kudumigwa,
Yalingwidichila kuno yang'hali kuhulichiza,
Nhumbula ya munhu yanguwezaga kwimilila utamwa,
Munhu yawele na nyhala kangulutililaga kilangusa kuwala uwanzi,
Ndolendole yangumchumulilaga nzila yalingulavya,
Yalingilewela tandi kangonekaga yalingulonga kwa kukomya,
Kutowa simbi ndo kwanguduma kitwanza,
Mwenyelukolo yaditilwe gehile, kana nhumbula igagadale kusinda lukanzi lwa muji,
Ulonzi wa munhu wanguweza kumgutiza,
Umyango una mong'ho wa kigala ukomu ama kukopola,
Yalingumpata mche nakapata chinhu chinojile,
Wazunwa wangulandaga kwa kunyenyetela,
Goloko wenji wanguweza kumgwisa munhu,
